alert.note: Alert for Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Transylvania and southeastern Jackson Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Brevard, or near Lake Toxaway, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Toxaway, Gorges State Park, Lake Jocassee, Jocassee Gorges, Sapphire and Wolf Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
